name: The Theme is Unstable
description:
Controls:

  • Use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to MOVE
  • Use the MOUSE to AIM and SHOOT

Intructions:

  • You are in a cylindrical zombie apocalypse and the theme of the game changes automatically every few seconds, and each one affects in some way the game

The rejected themes:

  • Unstable - Just a camera shake :)
  • Summoning + Replication + Strength in numbers + It follows you - Duplicate you
  • Making Connections + On/Off - A little puzzle to make you lose :D
  • Decay - Kills one of your clones
  • Delivery - The enemies are delivery guys
  • One tool, many uses - You shoot crazy hammers LOL
  • Delay the inevitable - You only can knock back enemies
  • Keep your distance - Enemies are faster
  • The environment changes you - Changes you based where you stand
  • Leave something behind - Spawns ground mines behind you after some shoots
  • Everything changes at night - Change the language and turn the lights out!

Hope you have fun, because I had a lot making it :)
